column2: ENGLISH

Take this opportunity to get back at your rival and accuse [rival_target.GetHerHim] of apostasy. §Y[rival_target.GetBestName]§! might not be guilty - but your liege will be none the wiser either way...
You bring §Y[accused_apostate.GetBestName]§! to the court of §Y[Root.Liege.GetTitle] [Root.Liege.GetFirstName]§!, [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] will decide the fate of the apostate!
Has not been approached by the Assassins previously.
All §YIngredients§! are destroyed and will be removed from the Treasury.\n
§Y[GetSelectedIngredient_1]§! and §Y[GetSelectedIngredient_2]§! will be removed from the Treasury.\n
§Y[GetSelectedIngredient_1]§! and one random ingredient will be removed from the Treasury.\n
§Y[GetSelectedIngredient_1]§! will be removed from the Treasury.\n
§Y[GetSelectedIngredient_2]§! will be removed from the Treasury.\n
This option is available to you because you have an §YIngredient§! in your Treasury.\n \n
Some §YIngredients§! will be removed from the Treasury and sent to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, in preparation for the ritual.\nThere is a chance this will enhance your experience.\n
This option is available to you because you have multiple §YIngredients§! in your Treasury.\n \n
Has at least two §YIngredients§!
NOT already preparing a potion
Some §YIngredients§! are destroyed and will be removed from the Treasury.\n

them accepting your offer, leaving you alone for now\n
them laughing at your offer, before dragging you off to be burnt at the stake\n
them being defeated, leaving you alone for now\n
the woman rolling her eyes at you, before killing you\n
the demon hunter ignoring your offer, before killing you slowly\n
you getting killed in personal combat\n
you getting badly injured\n
The plans for your laboratory will only be dictated by what is most efficient but your secrets will not be as well guarded.
[Root.GetFullName] will make changes to [Root.GetHerHis] laboratory to placate the frightened locals rather than to increase efficiency.
Has a vassal with the apprentice minor title
Has NOT recently ventured to acquired ingredients
Does NOT have a full stockpile of ingredients
You call upon your apprentice to accompany you in a venture to gather ingredients with alchemical properties.\n
The Grand Master will get in contact with §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! about the loan.\n
The Grand Master has sufficient funds.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is marked for death.
The mark of death is cleared from §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is marked for death.
Has §Y[Root.assassins_debt.GetValue]§! gold.
failing to scare §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
This option is available due to you owning an observatory\n
This option is available due to you owning observatory equipment\n
This option is available due to you being a member of §Y[This.Society.GetName]§!.\n
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes Zunist.\n
Power: §YBenedictine Diligence§!\nUpon reaching rank 4, you will be approached by a fellow member of the Benedictine Order who will help you to become more diligent.
Character is in the same society as you are.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! brews a potion for §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! brews [From.GetHerselfHimself] a potion.\n
[Root.GetFullName] will aim for a small but functional laboratory.
Is allowed to choose a Hermetic Art at this time\n
Convert to your liege's faith
Attempt to negatively influence §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s personality, increasing [Root.GetHerHis] opinion of you by §G50§! upon success. Failure might tarnish your reputation, though...\n
Has the quest §YCorrupt [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
Has not attempted to corrupt §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! the past §Y10§! years\n
The power of the Council increases!
You decline the mission and will not be offered another for some time.
The §YProsperity§! of §Y[This.GetName]§! decreases slightly\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.GetHerHis] accomplices sets out for §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
Need to be wounded, maimed, have a disease or severe medical condition.
A disciple of [Root.GetDWDevil] will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not selected a familiar in the past 5 years\n
Did not betray society\n
[Root.GetFullName] will aim to build a laboratory that can handle somewhat more complicated procedures.
[Root.GetFullName] will spend funds to improve security and increase the efficiency of [Root.GetHerHis] Laboratory.
Has the quest §YEvoke the Sympathy of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
[Root.GetFullName] will build an experimental setup with as many furnaces, basins, and other contraptions as can reasonably be fitted.
[Root.GetFullName] will ensure the success of [Root.GetHerHis] future experiments by assembling a reference library for all occasions.
[Root.GetFullName] will now only tolerate the best of imported pottery from master potters.
[Root.GetFullName] will from now on spend more to ensure all glass that enter the laboratory is as durable and clear as possible.
[Root.GetFullName] will import alchemical tools from the master smiths that are best skilled to make them.
Maybe it's because [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is born under the [horoscope_child.GetWesternZodiacSign]?

I am not sure what my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] has been up to lately, but [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] certainly isn't proving to become the great [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] I once predicted in [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] horoscope.

My [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] has truly found [horoscope_child.GetHerselfHimself] in the destiny my horoscope predicted, so long ago. [horoscope_child.GetSheHeCap] will makes a fine [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole].
You will gain a trait appropriate for your zodiac sign!\n
A Grand Debate has NOT been held in the past 10 years\n
A Grand Debate is NOT currently in progress\n
Send an invitation to all members of [Root.Society.GetName].
Participating members will gain an increased opinion of §G5§! towards you for five years\n

The plans for your laboratory will have to fit into your existing castle.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] won't receive any more notifications about sick relatives.
Your knowledge of stellar phenomena increases.\n
Can access §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
Have religion §YGermanic§!\n
The viewing Character is the holder of this Character Modifier\n
[Root.GetFullName] will aim to build an advanced laboratory, capable of handling a number of complicated procedures.
Antichrist: $GAIN|=10+$
This may have repercussions upon my soul!
This might have repercussions upon my soul!
If §Y[monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName]§! enjoys this activity, this might lead to a friendship. Perhaps if it related to [monastic_friend.GetHerHis] education...?\n
What is the harm? It is not as if we are doing anything... Unnatural.\n
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to meditate recently.\n
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to do penance recently.\n
A holy ascetic will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
To complete this mission, build a temple holding in a county in your realm.
Must be a sinner\n
Must have been at the §Y[Root.GetSocietyRank]§! rank for at least three years\n
Must not be the leader of §Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§!\n
§Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§! must allow multiple characters to hold the next rank\n
Must NOT already be awaiting word for this request\n
[Root.GetFullName] will avoid spending money frivolously on books that tell [Root.GetHerHis] what he already knows.
[Root.GetFullName] will keep the laboratory supplied using the pottery from local potters to avoid the high price of imported crucibles.
[Root.GetFullName] will keep buying glass of inferior quality but helpers will be instructed to handle it with extreme care from now on.
[Root.GetFullName] will cut costs by relying on local smiths to produce the tools and other ironwork required for [Root.GetHerHis] alchemical experiments.
Lower ranking members are very likely to agree to your diplomatic requests.
Has [Root.Society.GetCurrencyName] greater or equal to §Y300§!
All sympathizers of the true faith will be encouraged to openly express their beliefs\nAfter this [Root.Society.GetName] will be no more, and you will no longer be able to recruit secret sympathizers
There are others in the realm sympathetic to the struggles of [Root.Society.GetName]
Platypus Herder

§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! infiltrates the residence of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and threatens [Root.GetHerHim] to pay [Root.GetHerHis] debt.

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! arranges a search for the rumored artifact.\n
Is also a secret follower of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.

§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to find a way to approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and talk about [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]. If successful, [Root.GetSheHe] may help to convert the realm.\n
Has not been approached to be inducted into another faith recently\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to find a way to make §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! contemplate the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.\n
Is not a secret believer in the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to teach [Root.GetHerHim] about the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
A loyal servant is sent to found a community of the true faith in [Root.GetName]
Shares the same true faith as §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!\n
Has not been invited to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§! recently
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! approaches §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! with the intent of inviting [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
The society's members are pleased with your celebration!\n
[Root.GetFullName] starts the construction of a Laboratory.
Abduction efforts stop
The search for the artifact is ended. A new councilor can be appointed to lead the search as long as the rumor is still viable.
Your induction attempt is successful! [Root.GetDWDevil] welcomes §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! into the coven.\n
